# Transport Canada Tender Notice

## Title:
Develop Documented Guidance or Best Practices on Damage Assessment Criteria and Guidelines for Non-Pressure Tank Cars

## Reference Number: CB-650-2209608
## Solicitation Number: T8080-230211
## Tender Closing Date: 2023-12-21T14:00:00

## Request for Statement of Capabilities:
Transport Canada invites suppliers to submit a statement of capabilities to develop documented guidance or best practices on damage assessment criteria and guidelines for non-pressure tank cars.

## Background:
The Transportation of Dangerous Goods Directorate (TDG) of Transport Canada requires expertise to develop documented guidance or best practices on damage assessment criteria and guidelines for non-pressure tank cars. This project aims to aid TDG specialists in their decision-making at incident sites involving non-pressure tank cars and other emergency responders.

## Statement of Capabilities:
Suppliers must demonstrate the following qualifications and experience:

* Access to the Association of American Railroads (AAR) Hazardous Materials Committee
* At least two individuals with experience working on the development of AAR’s 2021 document, Assessment Best Practices for Tank Car Tank Damage
* At least one individual with ten years of experience as a training program expert in tank car damage assessment within North America

## Project Objectives:
The contractor must perform the following tasks:

* Literature review and industry scan to identify the types of damage and/or failure modes in non-pressure tank cars
* Analysis and recommendations to develop a guidance document or best practices to help emergency responders with their actions and/or decision-making processes

## Evaluation Criteria:
Proposals will be evaluated based on the supplier's experience, qualifications, and expertise in developing documented guidance or best practices.

## Important Dates:

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-12-21T14:00:00
* Evaluation and Award: As per the Transportation Canada contracting process
